00054 CEPoll::CEPoll():
00055 m_iIDSeed(0)
00056 {
00057    CGuard::createMutex(m_EPollLock);
00058 }
00059 
00060 CEPoll::~CEPoll()
00061 {
00062    CGuard::releaseMutex(m_EPollLock);
00063 }
00064 
00065 int CEPoll::create()
00066 {
00067    CGuard pg(m_EPollLock);
00068 
00069    int localid = 0;
00070 
00071    #ifdef LINUX
00072    localid = epoll_create(1024);
00073    if (localid < 0)
00074       throw CUDTException(-1, 0, errno);
00075    #else
00076    // on BSD, use kqueue
00077    // on Solaris, use /dev/poll
00078    // on Windows, select
00079    #endif
00080 
00081    if (++ m_iIDSeed >= 0x7FFFFFFF)
00082       m_iIDSeed = 0;
00083 
00084    CEPollDesc desc;
00085    desc.m_iID = m_iIDSeed;
00086    desc.m_iLocalID = localid;
00087    m_mPolls[desc.m_iID] = desc;
00088 
00089    return desc.m_iID;
00090 }
00091 
00092 int CEPoll::add_usock(const int eid, const UDTSOCKET& u, const int* /*events*/)
00093 {
00094    CGuard pg(m_EPollLock);
00095 
00096    map<int, CEPollDesc>::iterator p = m_mPolls.find(eid);
00097    if (p == m_mPolls.end())
00098       throw CUDTException(5, 13);
00099 
00100    p->second.m_sUDTSocks.insert(u);
00101 
00102    return 0;
00103 }
00104 
00105 int CEPoll::add_ssock(const int eid, const SYSSOCKET& s, const int* events)
00106 {
00107    CGuard pg(m_EPollLock);
00108 
00109    map<int, CEPollDesc>::iterator p = m_mPolls.find(eid);
00110    if (p == m_mPolls.end())
00111       throw CUDTException(5, 13);
00112 
00113 #ifdef LINUX
00114    epoll_event ev;
00115 
00116    if (NULL == events)
00117       ev.events = EPOLLIN | EPOLLOUT | EPOLLERR;
00118    else
00119    {
00120       if (*events & UDT_EPOLL_IN)
00121          ev.events |= EPOLLIN;
00122       if (*events & UDT_EPOLL_OUT)
00123          ev.events |= EPOLLOUT;
00124       if (*events & UDT_EPOLL_ERR)
00125          ev.events |= EPOLLERR;
00126    }
00127 
00128    ev.data.fd = s;
00129    if (epoll_ctl(p->second.m_iLocalID, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, s, &ev) < 0)
00130       throw CUDTException();
00131 #endif
00132 
00133    p->second.m_sLocals.insert(s);
00134 
00135    return 0;
00136 }
00137 
00138 int CEPoll::remove_usock(const int eid, const UDTSOCKET& u, const int* /*events*/)
00139 {
00140    CGuard pg(m_EPollLock);
00141 
00142    map<int, CEPollDesc>::iterator p = m_mPolls.find(eid);
00143    if (p == m_mPolls.end())
00144       throw CUDTException(5, 13);
00145 
00146    p->second.m_sUDTSocks.erase(u);
00147 
00148    //this socket SHOULD NOT be removed from the ready set; application may need to learn the status from these sets
00149    //the ready sets can be cleared when the app calls epoll_wait
00150    //p->second.m_sUDTReads.erase(u);
00151    //p->second.m_sUDTWrites.erase(u);
00152 
00153    return 0;
00154 }
00155 
00156 int CEPoll::remove_ssock(const int eid, const SYSSOCKET& s, const int* events)
00157 {
00158    CGuard pg(m_EPollLock);
00159 
00160    map<int, CEPollDesc>::iterator p = m_mPolls.find(eid);
00161    if (p == m_mPolls.end())
00162       throw CUDTException(5, 13);
00163 
00164 #ifdef LINUX
00165    epoll_event ev;
00166 
00167    if (NULL == events)
00168       ev.events = EPOLLIN | EPOLLOUT | EPOLLERR;
00169    else
00170    {
00171       if (*events & UDT_EPOLL_IN)
00172          ev.events |= EPOLLIN;
00173       if (*events & UDT_EPOLL_OUT)
00174          ev.events |= EPOLLOUT;
00175       if (*events & UDT_EPOLL_ERR)
00176          ev.events |= EPOLLERR;
00177    }
00178 
00179    ev.data.fd = s;
00180    if (epoll_ctl(p->second.m_iLocalID, EPOLL_CTL_DEL, s, &ev) < 0)
00181       throw CUDTException();
00182 #endif
00183 
00184    p->second.m_sLocals.erase(s);
00185 
00186    return 0;
00187 }

00189 int CEPoll::wait(const int eid, set<UDTSOCKET>* readfds, set<UDTSOCKET>* writefds, int64_t msTimeOut, set<SYSSOCKET>* lrfds, set<SYSSOCKET>* lwfds)
00190 {
00191    int total = 0;
00192 
00193    int64_t entertime = CTimer::getTime();
00194    while (true)
00195    {
00196       CGuard::enterCS(m_EPollLock);
00197 
00198       map<int, CEPollDesc>::iterator p = m_mPolls.find(eid);
00199       if (p == m_mPolls.end())
00200       {
00201          CGuard::leaveCS(m_EPollLock);
00202          throw CUDTException(5, 13);
00203       }
00204 
00205       if ((NULL != readfds) && !p->second.m_sUDTReads.empty())
00206       {
00207          *readfds = p->second.m_sUDTReads;
00208          total += p->second.m_sUDTReads.size();
00209       }
00210 
00211       if ((NULL != writefds) && !p->second.m_sUDTWrites.empty())
00212       {
00213          *writefds = p->second.m_sUDTWrites;
00214          total += p->second.m_sUDTWrites.size();
00215       }
00216 
00217       if (lrfds || lwfds)
00218       {
00219          if (lrfds)
00220             lrfds->clear();
00221 
00222          if (lwfds)
00223             lwfds->clear();
00224 
00225          #ifdef LINUX
00226          const int max_events = p->second.m_sLocals.size();
00227          epoll_event ev[max_events];
00228          int nfds = epoll_wait(p->second.m_iLocalID, ev, max_events, 0);
00229 
00230          for (int i = 0; i < nfds; ++ i)
00231          {
00232             if ((NULL != lrfds) && (ev[i].events & EPOLLIN))
00233             {
00234                lrfds->insert(ev[i].data.fd);
00235                ++ total;
00236             }
00237             if ((NULL != lwfds) && (ev[i].events & EPOLLOUT))
00238             {
00239                lwfds->insert(ev[i].data.fd);
00240                ++ total;
00241             }
00242          }
00243          #else
00244          //currently "select" is used for all non-Linux platforms.
00245          //faster approaches can be applied for specific systems in the future.
00246 
00247          //"select" has a limitation on the number of sockets
00248 
00249          fd_set readfds;
00250          fd_set writefds;
00251          FD_ZERO(&readfds);
00252          FD_ZERO(&writefds);
00253 
00254          for (set<SYSSOCKET>::const_iterator i = p->second.m_sLocals.begin(); i != p->second.m_sLocals.end(); ++ i)
00255          {
00256             if (lrfds)
00257                FD_SET(*i, &readfds);
00258             if (lwfds)
00259                FD_SET(*i, &writefds);
00260          }
00261 
00262          timeval tv;
00263          tv.tv_sec = 0;
00264          tv.tv_usec = 0;
00265          int r = select(0, &readfds, &writefds, NULL, &tv);
00266 
00267          if (r > 0)
00268          {
00269             for (set<SYSSOCKET>::const_iterator i = p->second.m_sLocals.begin(); i != p->second.m_sLocals.end(); ++ i)
00270             {
00271                if (lrfds)
00272                {
00273                   if (FD_ISSET(*i, &readfds))
00274                   {
00275                      lrfds->insert(*i);
00276                      ++ total;
00277                   }
00278                }
00279 
00280                if (lwfds)
00281                {
00282                   if (FD_ISSET(*i, &writefds))
00283                   {
00284                      lwfds->insert(*i);
00285                      ++ total;
00286                   }
00287                }
00288             }
00289          }
00290          #endif
00291       }
00292 
00293       CGuard::leaveCS(m_EPollLock);
00294 
00295       if (total > 0)
00296          return total;
00297 
00298       if ((msTimeOut >= 0) && (int64_t(CTimer::getTime() - entertime) >= msTimeOut * 1000LL))
00299          break;
00300 
00301       CTimer::waitForEvent();
00302    }
00303 
00304    return 0;
00305 }
00306 
00307 int CEPoll::release(const int eid)
00308 {
00309    CGuard pg(m_EPollLock);
00310 
00311    map<int, CEPollDesc>::iterator i = m_mPolls.find(eid);
00312    if (i == m_mPolls.end())
00313       throw CUDTException(5, 13);
00314 
00315    #ifdef LINUX
00316    // release local/system epoll descriptor
00317    ::close(i->second.m_iLocalID);
00318    #endif
00319 
00320    m_mPolls.erase(i);
00321 
00322    return 0;
00323 }
00324 
00325 int CEPoll::enable_write(const UDTSOCKET& uid, set<int>& eids)
00326 {
00327    CGuard pg(m_EPollLock);
00328 
00329    map<int, CEPollDesc>::iterator p;
00330 
00331    vector<int> lost;
00332    for (set<int>::iterator i = eids.begin(); i != eids.end(); ++ i)
00333    {
00334       p = m_mPolls.find(*i);
00335       if (p == m_mPolls.end())
00336       {
00337          lost.push_back(*i);
00338       }
00339       else
00340       {
00341          p->second.m_sUDTWrites.insert(uid);
00342       }
00343    }
00344 
00345    for (vector<int>::iterator i = lost.begin(); i != lost.end(); ++ i)
00346       eids.erase(*i);
00347 
00348    return 0;
00349 }
00350

00352 {
00353    CGuard pg(m_EPollLock);
00354 
00355    map<int, CEPollDesc>::iterator p;
00356 
00357    vector<int> lost;
00358    for (set<int>::iterator i = eids.begin(); i != eids.end(); ++ i)
00359    {
00360       p = m_mPolls.find(*i);
00361       if (p == m_mPolls.end())
00362       {
00363          lost.push_back(*i);
00364       }
00365       else
00366       {
00367          p->second.m_sUDTReads.insert(uid);
00368       }
00369    }
00370 
00371    for (vector<int>::iterator i = lost.begin(); i != lost.end(); ++ i)
00372       eids.erase(*i);
00373 
00374    return 0;
00375 }

00387       if (p == m_mPolls.end())
00388       {
00389          lost.push_back(*i);
00390       }
00391       else
00392       {
00393          p->second.m_sUDTWrites.erase(uid);
00394       }
00395    }
00396 
00397    for (vector<int>::iterator i = lost.begin(); i != lost.end(); ++ i)
00398       eids.erase(*i);
